data.title: Base Area ID Number
data.definition: A unique identification number assigned to each base area

data.title: Province/Country Code
data.definition: This field contains a three digit code indicating the country and province location of the base area. For the code values see the table CPRVS (Table 5).

data.title: Viet Cong Military Region
data.definition: This field contains a two digit number indicating the VCMR where the base area is located. For the code values see the table VCMRS (Table 4).

data.title: Approximate Center of the Area in UTM
data.definition: This field contains the approximate center of the base area by UTM coordinate.

data.title: UTM-First in Boundary of the Area
data.definition: This field contains the first in a series of up to nine UTM coordinates used to describe the boundary of the base area.

data.title: UTM-Second in Boundary of the Area
data.definition: This field contains the second in a series of up to nine UTM coordinates used to describe the boundary of the base area.

data.title: UTM-Third in Boundary of the Area
data.definition: This field contains the third in a series of up to nine UTM coordinates used to describe the boundary of the base area.

data.title: UTM-Fourth in Boundary of the Area
data.definition: This field contains the fourth in a series of up to nine UTM coordinates used to describe the boundary of the base area.

data.title: UTM-Fifth in Boundary of the Area
data.definition: This field contains the fifth in a series of up to nine UTM coordinates used to describe the boundary of the base area.

data.title: UTM-Sixth in Boundary of the Area
data.definition: This field contains the sixth in a series of up to nine UTM coordinates used to describe the boundary of the base area.

data.title: UTM-Seventh in Boundary of the Area
data.definition: This field contains the seventh in a series of up to nine UTM coordinates used to describe the boundary of the base area.

data.title: UTM-Eighth in Boundary of the Area
data.definition: This field contains the eighth in a series of up to nine UTM coordinates used to describe the boundary of the base area.

data.title: UTM-Ninth in Boundary of the Area
data.definition: This field contains the ninth in a series of up to nine UTM coordinates used to describe the boundary of the base area.

data.title: Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1967
data.definition: This field (XYY) contains the Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1967. "X" identifies the campaign as being in-country (1) or out-country (2) and the "YY" value identifies the priority of the base area to the enemy as assigned by the Combined Campaign Plan.

data.title: Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1968
data.definition: This field (XYY) contains the Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1968. "X" identifies the campaign as being in-country (1) or out-country (2) and the "YY" value identifies the priority of the base area to the enemy as assigned by the Combined Campaign Plan.

data.title: Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1969
data.definition: This field (XYY) contains the Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1969. "X" identifies the campaign as being in-country (1) or out-country (2) and the "YY" value identifies the priority of the base area to the enemy; the "YY" value gives the priority of the base in the South Vietnam corps area if it is located in-country or its priority in each of the individual countries if it is located outside of Vietnam.

data.title: Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1970
data.definition: This field (XYY) contains the Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1970. "X" identifies the campaign as being in-country (1) or out-country (2) and the "YY" value identifies the priority of the base area to the enemy; the "YY" value gives the priority of the base in the South Vietnam corps area if it is located in-country or its priority in each of the individual countries if it is located outside of Vietnam.

data.title: Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1971
data.definition: This field (XYY) contains the Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1971. "X" identifies the campaign as being in-country (1) or out-country (2) and the "YY" value identifies the priority of the base area to the enemy; the "YY" value gives the priority of the base in the South Vietnam corps area if it is located in-country or its priority in each of the individual countries if it is located outside of Vietnam.

data.title: Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1972
data.definition: This field (XYY) contains the Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1972. "X" identifies the campaign as being in-country (1) or out-country (2) and the "YY" value identifies the priority of the base area to the enemy; the "YY" value gives the priority of the base in the South Vietnam corps area if it is located in-country or its priority in each of the individual countries if it is located outside of Vietnam.

data.title: Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1973
data.definition: This field (XYY) contains the Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1973. "X" identifies the campaign as being in-country (1) or out-country (2) and the "YY" value identifies the priority of the base area to the enemy; the "YY" value gives the priority of the base in the South Vietnam corps area if it is located in-country or its priority in each of the individual countries if it is located outside of Vietnam.

data.title: Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1974
data.definition: This field (XYY) contains the Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1974. "X" identifies the campaign as being in-country (1) or out-country (2) and the "YY" value identifies the priority of the base area to the enemy; the "YY" value gives the priority of the base in the South Vietnam corps area if it is located in-country or its priority in each of the individual countries if it is located outside of Vietnam.

data.title: Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1975
data.definition: This field (XYY) contains the Combined Campaign Plan Priority for 1975. "X" identifies the campaign as being in-country (1) or out-country (2) and the "YY" value identifies the priority of the base area to the enemy; the "YY" value gives the priority of the base in the South Vietnam corps area if it is located in-country or its priority in each of the individual countries if it is located outside of Vietnam.

data.title: Data First in a Base Study Area
data.definition: This field contains the date when the base area was first reported in a MACV base area study.

data.title: Current Date of UTMs
data.definition: This field contains the most current CICV date for the UTM coordinates.

data.title: Current Status
data.data_values: A: Active; I: Inactive; N: Neutralized; D: Deleted
data.definition: This field contains the current status of the base area as obtained from MACV Monthly Progress Report published by the Combined Intelligence Center, Vietnam (CICV), or from the Enemy Base Area Study.

data.title: As of Date for the Current Status
data.definition: This field contains the date of the current MACV Monthly Progress Report.

data.title: Date of Last Update
data.definition: This field contains the actual date of the most recent update of the file.

data.title: Approximate Center of the Area in Lat-Long
data.definition: Approximate Center of the Area in Lat-Long

data.title: First Lat-Long in the Boundary
data.definition: First Lat-Long in the Boundary

data.title: Second Lat-Long in the Boundary
data.definition: Second Lat-Long in the Boundary

data.title: Third Lat-Long in the Boundary
data.definition: Third Lat-Long in the Boundary

data.title: Fourth Lat-Long in the Boundary
data.definition: Fourth Lat-Long in the Boundary

data.title: Fifth Lat-Long in the Boundary
data.definition: Fifth Lat-Long in the Boundary

data.title: Sixth Lat-Long in the Boundary
data.definition: Sixth Lat-Long in the Boundary

data.title: Seventh Lat-Long in the Boundary
data.definition: Seventh Lat-Long in the Boundary

data.title: Eighth Lat-Long in the Boundary
data.definition: Eighth Lat-Long in the Boundary

data.title: Ninth Lat-Long in the Boundary
data.definition: Ninth Lat-Long in the Boundary

data.title: Year of Action and Condition Data
data.definition: This field indicates which year the historical data in the subset pertains to.

data.title: Action for January
data.data_values: C: Combat Sweep/S&D and Recon; P: Penetrated; R: Recon; S: S&D/Combat Sweep
data.definition: This field contains a code indicating what type of action(s) took place against the base area in January.

data.title: Conditions for January
data.data_values: A: Active; I: Inactive; N: Neutralized; D: Deleted
data.definition: This field contains the condition of the base area for the month of January.
